location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Draft letter from Sir Lewis Pelly, Heathercliff, Bournemouth to Lord Lytton (Edward Bulwer-Lytton, 2nd Baron Lytton)

mods.abstract: Draft of a letter regarding gossip that is being spread regarding the alleged unpopularity of the Viceroy of India and noting that the most recent references to it in the Indian news appeared to be devoid of any truth.The letter has no beginning or end and there are several crossings out and corrections.
